title: India : mobile activities as of January 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Visit a social network and lowest at Response Look for product information.
The Share of respondents of Response Visit a social network is 5.25% larger than the minimum value at Look for product information.

max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 21.0 is found at Response Visit a social network and the minimum is found at Look for product information where Response is 4.0.
The highest value at Response Visit a social network is 5.25x times more than the lowest value at Look for product information.
Share of respondents at Response Visit a social network is 21.0 , second place is  at 21.0, and thirdly is Use a search engine at 15.0.
Response Look for product information, and Play games have the same Share of respondents.
The lowest value 4.0 at Look for product information is almost 1.75 times smaller than the average value 12.0.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 60.0.
